title: Half-hearted Gopher NG
content: So, yeah, I had some spare time at lunch and I started expanding my little XOXO linked outlines thing into a more fully-fledged Gopher NG with OPML support. But, I'm not sure if I'll really do much more with it. It started on a lark, really. But after awhile, I realized that I don't have any use for it other than as an interesting exercise. Moving along...
